articles.title: Google adds AI features to Chromebook Plus devices - TechCrunch
articles.summary: Google adds AI features to Chromebook Plus devices Google’s adding a slew of AI features to its productivity-focused Chromebook Plus line of devices, including a screen-selection tool for search and text capture, a tool that explains complex text, and NotebookLM.
